page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most employment with the area is based upon agriculture, either farming itself or supplying goods or services to farming. The only alternative employment within the area is supplied by the garage at Hurlditch Down, the Public House at Chipshop, the caravan site at Woodovis Farm (seasonal),small machinery hire and haulage firms in Sydenham Damerel and a small meat processing firm in Portington. A large proportion of the people living in the survey area commute to the local towns and city - Tavistock, Lanceston and Plymouth. Quite a number of people are self- employed either in small businesses or as contracting agricultural workers. Unemployment is quite low and there is a small proportion of retired people.
